code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import filter from"./slices/filterSlice.ts";import cart from"./slices/cardSlice.ts";import pizzas from"./slices/pizzasSlice.ts";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";export const store=configureStore({reducer:{filter,cart,pizzas}});export const useAppDispatch=()=>useDispatch();
